channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Zebra light's not working, 16th October
item.description:
Zebra light's not working, outside the coop and the petrol garage in long lane bexleyheath
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 41, Wenvoe Avenue, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Honey Fungus, 16th October
item.description:
The tree is dead, and has been cut down to approx 8 feet. There is honey fungus around the base, which, if not dealt with could decimate trees in the surrounding area. I understand there is no cure for honey fugus. There is a lot about it on the internet, and I have had dealings with it in the past. It is lethal to all sorts of trees and plants.,
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingsway, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 52 Victoria Street -the albert pub, 16th October
item.description:
There is a large advertising board placed on the pavement in front of the shop. It blocks the walkway and makes it difficult for pedestrians to pass. Please take action to remove or relocate it so that people can walk safely. 52 Victoria Street The Albert

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 52, Victoria Street, Victoria, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overnight fly tipping in Little Bornes., 16th October
item.description:
On the night of 15/16 October a considerable amount of general garbage, some in plastic bags, enough to fill a Transit van was dumped at the side of No 13 Little Bornes. Some of the waste smells bad and residents are concerned it may attract rats.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Little Bornes, Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light not working, 16th October
item.description:
Street light on Kingswood Drive 209112, not working - so too dark for pedestrians. Aware of the problem beginning of this week.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingswood Drive, Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish strewn along the road, 16th October
item.description:
Rubbish strewn along the road behind the back of Kwiksave and Belvedere Pharmacy. Some bin sacks must have been dumped which have been ripped open with rubbish on both sides of the road. Plus an Asda trolley dumped for good measure. This access road isn't particularly nice at the best of times but driving my elderly mother to the rear of the pharmacy for her covid jab was a joke this year. Not wanting to drive through the rubbish plus there was no way to turn around as cars parked in front of the gates to Railway Place (which would be the natural place to turn around) that clearly say no parking so I then had to reverse back past the rubbish.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dylan Road, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weeds Left, 16th October
item.description:
Weeds have been dug up along Hearns Road but have not been removed, have been left in kerbside. Please can this be cleared.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 51, Hearns Road, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping - black bags, old garden chairs, old plastic bins, 16th October
item.description:
Hi, there is a continual issue with fly tipping here and there are currently black bags, some ofd garden chairs, plastic bins, children's toys and more in this location. The bin men came this morning but ignored the bags not in the bins.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Church Road, Camberwell, London
